contentfulProduct.seoDescription: Woven of 100% organic long-staple Turkish cotton, our gauze robe is super soft, lightweight, and incredibly luxurious.
contentfulProduct.title: Organic Turkish Cotton Gauze Robe

content.value: Woven of 100% organic long-staple Turkish cotton, our gauze robe is super soft, lightweight, and incredibly luxurious.
Made of 100% organic long-staple Turkish cotton
Robe is accented with kimono collar, two hidden side pockets, and a self-tie sash
Free of harmful chemicals and toxins
Made with care in Turkey
Machine wash cool using mild laundry detergent. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low or hang dry. Remove promptly.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Made of 100% organic long-staple Turkish cotton
  • Robe is accented with kimono collar, two hidden side pockets, and a self-tie sash
  • Free of harmful chemicals and toxins
  • Made with care in Turkey
